name: Roots of Ariadne
description:
Explore the dark and eerie depths of the Paris Catacombs in this thrilling puzzle maze horror game. Trapped deep underground, you must use your wits to navigate the labyrinthine tunnels and find keys to uncover the secrets hidden within following doors. With every turn, you'll face new horrors and dangers as you delve deeper into the catacombs, where the dead have been interred for centuries. Can you survive the horrors of the catacombs and make it out alive? Find out in this heart-pumping journey through the depths of Paris' most infamous underworld.

A hint - follow the root and don't make deadly mistakes.

CONTROLS

Move - WASD

Interact - E

Pause - P

 

Team:

Isabelle Winkler- 3D Art & Textures
Matěj Kaločai - Programming & Art
Viktorija Doļa - Puzzle & Level Design - Itch page
Dylano Solter - Programming - Itch page
Jack Jadoenath - Design & Programming - Itch page

Catinca Matei - 3D Art & Textures

Additional sounds by https://www.zapsplat.com/

In participation with :

CMGT Jam - Block B 22/23
